name: Weighty Wisdom
description:
It's hard being the librarian to a magical library.

Especially when someone's taken all the books off the shelves!

How To Play

  • Use the arrow keys to control the librarian and travel across the tiles
  • Collect all the books and take them back to the shelves
  • Carrying books makes you heavier
  • The heavier you are, the more damage you do to the tiles
  • Make you way across all 10 floors to win!
